DOC.brief_summary: To determine predictive factor positive response latanoprost 0.005 % / timolol 0.5 % fix combination ( defined 10 % IOP reduction baseline ) , 12 week treatment ( age , sex , ethnic origin , patient 's medical history , family history OAG OHT , concomitant systemic treatment beta-blockers , etiology , IOP baseline , corneal thickness , compliance , adverse event ) .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Of Predictive Factors Allowing To An Additional 10 % Reduction Of Intra-Ocular Pressure
